Im Rahmen der Programmplanung wird auf B: During program planning, the quantity of parts to be produced is determined based on the sales request and inventory levels.
In diesem Schritt wird der sogenannte Ka: In this step, the so-called capacity plan is drawn up on the basis of the sales request in connection with the setup times, setup steps, overtime, additional shifts, etc.
Innerhalb der Mengenplanung gilt es, das: Within the quantity planning it is necessary to deal with the topic of orders and to clarify which parts have to be ordered with which shipping method.
